display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Full Backup
├─ Complete database copy
├─ Size: 100GB
├─ Time: 2 hours
└─ Frequency: Weekly

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Differential Backup
├─ Changes since last FULL
├─ Size: Growing (5-50GB)
├─ Time: 30-60 min
└─ Frequency: Daily

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Incremental Backup
├─ Changes since last backup
├─ Size: Consistent (2-5GB)
├─ Time: 5-15 min
└─ Frequency: Every 6 hours

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 10px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 10px; text-align: center;
